sentences.en: "The visitors to the snow-covered landmass are endangering not just the Antarctic region by their actions, but also the rest of the world, " he said.
sentences.cn: 他说，“游客参观冰雪覆盖大陆的行为不仅危及到南极地区，而且危及到世界其它地区。”

sentences.en: Antarctica is the earth's coldest landmass.
sentences.cn: 南极洲是地球上最冷的大陆.

sentences.en: Dahongshan Rock Group is the crystalline basement in the SW margin of the Yangzi Landmass.
sentences.cn: 大红山岩群是扬子陆块西南缘的结晶基底.

sentences.en: It is a collision zone between Jiangnan landmass and Cathaysia landmass.
sentences.cn: 它是江南陆块与华夏陆块神功运动形成的碰撞拼贴带.

sentences.en: Many geographers now call this landmass Eurasia.
sentences.cn: 许多地理学家现在把这块陆地叫作欧亚大陆.

sentences.en: Veiled beneath the Persian Gulf, a once-fertile landmass may have supported some of the earliest humans outside Africa some 75,000 to 100,000 years ago, a new review of research suggests.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究评论表明，在波斯湾的海底，也许存在过一片肥沃的土地，它曾在约75,000到100,000年前供养着除非洲大陆之外最早的人类先祖。

trans.tran_en: a large area of land such as a continent
